query: Follow every requirement below strictly. Produce outputs that are detailed, actionable, architecturally sound, multistep, and include code, diagrams, and deployment plans. Do not skip or summarize sections unless instructed.
key_findings:
"code": "# my_fastapi_app/
# ├── app/
# │   ├── __init__.py
# │   ├── main.py             # FastAPI app instance, root routes
# │   ├── core/               # Configuration, settings, database setup
# │   │   ├── __init__.py
# │   │   ├── config.py
# │   │   ├── database.py
# │   │   └── security.py
# │   ├── api/                # API routers (endpoints)
# │   │   ├── __init__.py
# │   │   ├── v1/
# │   │   │   ├── __init__.py
# │   │   │   ├── endpoints/  # Specific resource endpoints (users, items)
# │   │   │   │   ├── __init__.py
# │   │   │   │   ├── users.py
# │   │   │   │   └── items.py
# │   │   │   └── deps.py     # Common dependencies (DB session, auth)
# │   ├── crud/               # CRUD operations (data access layer)
# │   │   ├── __init__.py
# │   │   ├── user.py
# │   │   └── item.py
# │   ├── models/             # SQLAlchemy ORM models
# │   │   ├── __init__.py
# │   │   ├── user.py
# │   │   └── item.py
# │   ├── schemas/            # Pydantic models for request/response
# │   │   ├── __init__.py
# │   │   ├── user.py
# │   │   └── item.py
# │   └── services/           # Business logic layer
# │       ├── __init__.py
# │       ├── user.py
# │       └── item.py
# ├── alembic/
# │   ├── versions/
# │   └── env.py
# ├── alembic.ini
# ├── requirements.txt
# └── .env"

"code": "from sqlalchemy.ext.asyncio import create_async_engine, AsyncSession, async_sessionmaker
from sqlalchemy.orm import declarative_base
from app.core.config import settings

# Database URL from settings
SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URL = settings.DATABASE_URL

# Create async engine
engine = create_async_engine(
    SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URL,
    pool_pre_ping=True, # Test connections for liveness
    pool_size=settings.DB_POOL_SIZE, # Max connections in pool
    max_overflow=settings.DB_MAX_OVERFLOW # Max connections beyond pool_size
)

# Create an async session maker
AsyncSessionLocal = async_sessionmaker(
    autocommit=False,
    autoflush=False,
    bind=engine,
    class_=AsyncSession,
    expire_on_commit=False # Prevent objects from expiring after commit
)

Base = declarative_base()

# Dependency to get an async database session
async def get_db():
    async with AsyncSessionLocal() as session:
        try:
            yield session
        finally:
            await session.close()"
